notes_translated.fr: La BCFPI est un format d'entrevue structuree, administree par telephone avec les parents, les enseignants ou les adolescents. On recommande de completer les BCFPI a la prise en charge, avant l'evaluation clinique et le traitement. Les donnees ont ete tirees directement des rapports annuels de la BCFPI de 2008 a 2013\. Elles couvrent les elements suivants concernant chaque client : * age * sexe * Region du MSEJ (ministere des Services a l'enfance et a la jeunesse) *[BCFPI]: Brief Child and Family Phone Interview
notes_translated.en: The BCFPI is a structured interview format, administered over the telephone with parents, teachers or adolescents. It is recommended that BCFPIs are completed at intake, prior to clinical assessment and treatment. Data was extracted directly from BCFPI Annual Reports from 2008-2013. It covers each client's: * age * gender * MCYS (Ministry of Children and Youth Services) region *[BCFPI]: Brief Child and Family Phone Interview
